paragraphs.text:
%md
# About
**Lab:** Hive Joins
**Objective:** Become familiar with using Hive joins
**File locations:** hostname:/tmp/movies hdfs:///data/movies
**Successful outcome:** Understanding hive Joins
**Before you begin:** N/A
**Related lessons:** Hive Joins

---

msg.data:
About

Lab: Hive Joins
Objective: Become familiar with using Hive joins
File locations: hostname:/tmp/movies hdfs:///data/movies
Successful outcome: Understanding hive Joins
Before you begin: N/A
Related lessons: Hive Joins

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Setup
This setup may have been completed in an earlier notebook

msg.data:
Setup

This setup may have been completed in an earlier notebook

paragraphs.title: Retrieve the files from IMDb
paragraphs.text:
%sh
rm -r /tmp/movies
mkdir -p /tmp/movies
wget -nv https://datasets.imdbws.com/title.basics.tsv.gz -O /tmp/movies/title.basics.tsv.gz
wget -nv https://datasets.imdbws.com/title.crew.tsv.gz -O /tmp/movies/title.crew.tsv.gz
wget -nv https://datasets.imdbws.com/name.basics.tsv.gz -O /tmp/movies/name.basics.tsv.gz
wget -nv https://datasets.imdbws.com/title.ratings.tsv.gz -O /tmp/movies/title.ratings.tsv.gz

paragraphs.title: List the directory for /tmp/movies
paragraphs.text:
%sh
ls /tmp/movies

paragraphs.title: Use gunzip to extract the files
paragraphs.text:
%sh
gunzip /tmp/movies/title.basics.tsv.gz
gunzip /tmp/movies/title.crew.tsv.gz
gunzip /tmp/movies/name.basics.tsv.gz
gunzip /tmp/movies/title.ratings.tsv.gz

paragraphs.title: List directory for /tmp/movies
paragraphs.text:
%sh
ls /tmp/movies

paragraphs.title: Copy the movie data in HDFS
paragraphs.text:
%sh
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /data/movies
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -mkdir /data/movies
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -put /tmp/movies/* /data/movies

paragraphs.title: Grant Hive access to /data/movie
paragraphs.text:
%sh
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs chown -R hive /data/movies

paragraphs.title: List the content of HDFS /data/movies
paragraphs.text:
%sh
hdfs dfs -ls /data/movies

paragraphs.title: Create the movies database
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS movies CASCADE;

CREATE DATABASE movies;

USE movies;

-- Contains the following information for titles
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE movie_title_stage (
                        tconst string,
                        titleType string,
                        primaryTitle string,
                        originalTitle string,
                        isAdult string,
                        startYear string,
                        endYear string,
                        runtimeMinutes string,
                        genres ARRAY<STRING>
                        ) 
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY '\t' 
LOCATION '/warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/movie_title_stage/';

-- Load data
LOAD DATA  INPATH '/data/movies/title.basics.tsv' OVERWRITE INTO TABLE movie_title_stage;

-- Remove header for movie_title
ALTER TABLE movie_title_stage SET TBLPROPERTIES ("skip.header.line.count"="1");


-- Contains the information for directors and writers
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE movie_crew_stage(
                        tconst string,
                        directors ARRAY<STRING>,
                        writers ARRAY<STRING>
                        ) 
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY '\t' 
LOCATION '/warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/movie_crew_stage/';

-- Load data movie_crew
LOAD DATA  INPATH '/data/movies/title.crew.tsv' OVERWRITE INTO TABLE movie_crew_stage;

-- Remove header for movie_crew
ALTER TABLE movie_crew_stage SET TBLPROPERTIES ("skip.header.line.count"="1");

-- Contains the information for names
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE movie_crew_info_stage(
                        nconst string,
                        primaryName string,
                        birthYear string,
                        deathYear string,
                        primaryProfession ARRAY<STRING>,
                        knownForTitles ARRAY<STRING>
                        )
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY '\t' 
LOCATION '/warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/movie_crew_info_stage/';

-- Load data movie_crew_info
LOAD DATA  INPATH '/data/movies/name.basics.tsv' OVERWRITE INTO TABLE movie_crew_info_stage;

-- Remove header for movie_crew_info
ALTER TABLE movie_crew_info_stage SET TBLPROPERTIES ("skip.header.line.count"="1");


-- Ratings and vote information for titles
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ratings_stage(
                        tconst string,
                        averageRting double,
                        numVotes int
                        ) 
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY '\t' 
LOCATION '/warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/ratings_stage/';


-- Load data ratings
LOAD DATA  INPATH '/data/movies/title.ratings.tsv' OVERWRITE INTO TABLE ratings_stage;

-- Remove header for ratings
ALTER TABLE ratings_stage SET TBLPROPERTIES ("skip.header.line.count"="1");

%md
# Lab

msg.data:
We are going to use the new movie database. You can do a describe on the tables.

use movies;
describe movie_title;
describe movie_crew;
describe movie_crew_info;
describe ratings;

Review the tables to determine keys to join.

paragraphs.text:
%md
We are going to create a materialized view using a table join.

~~~
Create a materialized view  mv_movie_ratings that joins tables movie_title and rating. 
Include only the movies that have a start year after 2001 and an average rating greater than 5.5. (Limit to 5 rows.) 
~~~

But first we need to drop the materialized view if it already exists.

msg.data:
We are going to create a materialized view using a table join.

Create a materialized view  mv_movie_ratings that joins tables movie_title and rating. 
Include only the movies that have a start year after 2001 and an average rating greater than 5.5. (Limit to 5 rows.)

But first we need to drop the materialized view if it already exists.

paragraphs.title: 5 - Drop the materialized view if exist
6 - Create the materialized view
7 - Execute a Query on the materialized view. Limit 5

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Solution
---

paragraphs.title: 1 - Use movies database and create a join for movie_title_stage and rating_stage title using the tconst key. Show the title type, primary title ,original title and average rating. Limit 5
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
SELECT movie_title_stage.titleType, movie_title_stage.primaryTitle, movie_title_stage.originalTitle, ratings_stage.averageRting FROM movie_title_stage JOIN ratings_stage ON (movie_title_stage.tconst=ratings_stage.tconst) LIMIT 5;

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

[{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

[{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: 2 - Execute the Explain Plan on the Join statement
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
EXPLAIN SELECT movie_title_stage.titleType, movie_title_stage.primaryTitle, movie_title_stage.originalTitle, ratings_stage.averageRting FROM movie_title_stage JOIN ratings_stage ON (movie_title_stage.tconst=ratings_stage.tconst) LIMIT 5;

paragraphs.title: 3 - Join the movie_crew_info_stage table to the movie_crew_stage table. Display the Title Type, Original Title, Movie Title, Start Year, Primary name of crew member, crew member birth year and primary profession. ( Hint: You may need to use the substring UDF on the table keys.)

[{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: 4 - Execute the Explain Plans on the Join statement

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: 5 - Drop the materialized view if exists
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP MATERIALIZED VIEW IF EXISTS movies.mv_movie_ratings;

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: 6 - Create the materialized view
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS movies.mv_movie_ratings AS SELECT movie_title_stage.titleType, movie_title_stage.primaryTitle, movie_title_stage.originalTitle, ratings_stage.averageRting from movie_title_stage JOIN ratings_stage ON (movie_title_stage.tconst=ratings_stage.tconst) where movie_title_stage.startYear> 2001 and ratings_stage.averageRting >5.5;

paragraphs.title: 7 - Execute a Query on the materialized view. Limit 5
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
SELECT * FROM movies.mv_movie_ratings LIMIT 5;

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%md
We hope you've enjoyed this lab. Below are additional resources that you should find useful:

1. [Cloudera Apache Spark Tutorials](http://hortonworks.com/tutorials/#tuts-developers) are your natural next step where you can explore Spark in more depth.
2. [Cloudera Community Connection (HCC)](https://community.hortonworks.com/spaces/85/data-science.html?type=question) is a great resource for questions and answers on Spark, Data Analytics/Science, and many more Big Data topics.
3. [Cloudera Apache Spark Docs](https://docs.hortonworks.com/HDPDocuments/HDP3/HDP-3.0.1/spark-overview/content/analyzing_data_with_apache_spark.html) - official Spark documentation.
4. [Cloudera Apache Zeppelin Docs](https://docs.hortonworks.com/HDPDocuments/HDP3/HDP-3.0.1/zeppelin-overview/content/overview.html) - official Zeppelin documentation.
